SELECT SEQ_RESERVE_PLACE.NEXTVAL FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO TBL_RESERVE_PLACE(RESERVE_PLACE_NUMBER, RESERVE_PLACE_DATE, RESERVE_PLACE_MORNING, RESERVE_PLACE_AFTERNOON, RESERVE_PLACE_DINNER, PLACE_NUMBER) VALUES (#{reservePlaceNumber}, #{reservePlaceDate}, #{reservePlaceMorning}, #{reservePlaceAfternoon}, #{reservePlaceDinner}, #{placeNumber})
